TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableRowCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableRowCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的行。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the rows of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以编程方式管理一系列对象中的行表示控件。Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the rows in an control. 此类通常用于添加、 删除或修改行中的内容控件。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含表示的集合的属性对象。An control contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 每个表示表中的单个行。Each represents an individual row in the table. 包含表示的集合的属性对象。An contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象，反过来，表示表的各单元格。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of the table. 若要检索的单个单元格，请先获取对象，表示从包含该单元格的行的集合控件。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object, representing the row containing the cell, from the collection of the control. 然后就可以获取对象，表示从行中的单元格的集合。You can then get the object, representing the cell in the row, from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态生成的内容控件，将行添加到此控件集合。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding rows to an collection. 请注意，表的属性是对象。Notice that the property of a table is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/CS/htmltablerowcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/VB/htmltablerowcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加指定到末尾的对象集合。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 要插入集合中，中间使用方法。To insert an in the middle of the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法要追加的行所表示的表对象，到末尾集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a row of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 请注意，表的属性是对象。Notice that the property of a table is the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除所有中的对象集合和重置属性设置为`0`。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的所有项中都删除集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然后，新条目将添加到集合并显示在控件。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. span.span: Copies the items from the collection to the specified object, starting at the specified index in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将复制的内容到指定集合对象，从数组中的指定索引处开始。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified object, starting at the specified index in the array. > [!NOTE] > `array`参数必须是一个从零开始。The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建一个数组，包含其内容与相同集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 然后循环访问数组来显示集合的内容。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionCopyTo/CS/htmltablerowcollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionCopyTo/VB/htmltablerowcollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]

The number of objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定中包含的行数集合。Use the property to determine the number of rows contained in the collection. 循环访问集合以确定上限绑定时，通常使用属性。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定中的行数控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows in the control. 此值然后用作上限的一个循环来循环访问表的行。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the rows of a table. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建-实现可以循环访问以获取每个项中的对象集合。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用属性集合中获取当前元素。Use the property to get the current element in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法将枚举数移到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用方法在创建后的的实现的对象，或使用后方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项。You must call the method after creating an -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an object. 然后循环访问对象以显示的内容集合。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法删除从指定索引处的对象集合。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from the collection. 从零开始索引号。The index number is zero-based. 因此，集合中的第一项具有的索引值为`0`。Therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的索引值的范围之外的索引，将引发异常。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的指定索引处的项中删除集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 此示例将删除的第一行控件。This example removes the first row of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt/CS/htmltablerowcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt/VB/htmltablerowcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]
